channel.title: Signatures?
channel.description:
is it possible to let people have sigs on this forum?
since it would be cool if we could have sigs
since some people made userbars to advertise their sites and cant use themn here
and supporters?
Yes=
No=

item.title: Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @purescape_goldmod purescape_goldmod
item.description:
@purescape_goldmod wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:25, topic:7726”][glow=blue,2,300]<(>.<)> Kirby says “Don’t Do Drugz.”… But I heard him say "That’s Some Sour Cocain King DeeDeeDee[/glow]
[glow=green,2,300] Bob says “Psst… This guy next to me is masturbating…”
Frank says “Ignore him.”
Bob says “I can’t he is using my hand!”[/glow]
[glow=red,2,300] Cop says “License and Registration please.”
Random Guy says “I AIN’T EVEN GOT KEYZ I STOLE THIS ****ING CAR!”[/glow][/quote]
